channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Hurricane Helene batters the South. And, takeaways from voters in swing state Nevada
item.description: Hurricane Helene made landfall late last night as a Category 4 storm. It has since weakened but continues to batter the South, causing damage and power outages. And, takeaways from voters in Nevada.
item.content:encoded:
Hurricane Helene made landfall late last night as a Category 4 storm. It has since weakened but continues to batter the South, causing damage and power outages. And, takeaways from voters in Nevada.

(Image credit: Joe Raedle)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Severe floods causing health problems in south Bangladesh
item.description: The worst floods that Bangladesh has seen in decades occurred in August, displacing millions. Many people are still struggling to rebuild their lives and find sources of income.
item.content:encoded:
The worst floods that Bangladesh has seen in decades occurred in August, displacing millions. Many people are still struggling to rebuild their lives and find sources of income.

(Image credit: Fatima Tuj Johora)
item.dc:creator: Shamim Chowdhury

item.title: The BBC’s vast library of sound effects — 33,000 of them — is open to the public
item.description: Among the 33,000 sound effects, free for anyone to use, are reindeer grunts, frog croaks and crowds at the 1989 FA Cup Final. (Story aired on All Things Considered on Sept. 26, 2024.)
item.content:encoded: Among the 33,000 sound effects, free for anyone to use, are reindeer grunts, frog croaks and crowds at the 1989 FA Cup Final. (Story aired on All Things Considered on Sept. 26, 2024.)
item.dc:creator: Chloe Veltman

item.title: Biden's attorney general wanted to return to normal order; it hasn't been easy
item.description: The attorney general pledged to restore the Justice Department to normal order. It hasn't been easy, and may not last.
item.content:encoded:
The attorney general pledged to restore the Justice Department to normal order. It hasn't been easy, and may not last.

(Image credit: Samuel Corum)
item.dc:creator: Carrie Johnson

item.title: Q&A: Nevada Sen. Cortez Masto on teaming up with VP Harris as attorneys general
item.description: Morning Edition spoke to Nevada Sen. Catherine Cortez Masto, who worked with VP Harris when the two were state attorneys general, on why that experience is relevant to being Commander in Chief.
item.content:encoded:
Morning Edition spoke to Nevada Sen. Catherine Cortez Masto, who worked with VP Harris when the two were state attorneys general, on why that experience is relevant to being Commander in Chief.

(Image credit: Erin Hooley)
item.dc:creator: Majd Al-Waheidi

item.title: Dear Life Kit: My wife wants to use the last of our savings for a 4th round of IVF
item.description: An NPR listener says they are ready to adopt a child and move on from in vitro fertilization. But their wife is focused on having a baby.
item.content:encoded: An NPR listener says they are ready to adopt a child and move on from in vitro fertilization. But their wife is focused on having a baby.
item.dc:creator: Andee Tagle

item.title: As the White Sox narrowly avoid loss #121, fans bid farewell to a season to forget
item.description: The Chicago White Sox have 120 losses, tied for the most in a season — one more L, and the record would be theirs. Fans at the final home game said they wouldn't mind seeing history made.
item.content:encoded:
The Chicago White Sox have 120 losses, tied for the most in a season — one more L, and the record would be theirs. Fans at the final home game said they wouldn't mind seeing history made.

(Image credit: Michael Reaves/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Becky Sullivan

item.title: Migrants from around the world are trying to reach the U.S. via charter planes
item.description: The Biden administration accuses charter companies of collaborating with global smuggling networks.
item.content:encoded:
The Biden administration accuses charter companies of collaborating with global smuggling networks.

(Image credit: Mario Tama/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Emily Green

item.title: Legal questions about Pennsylvania mail-in ballots loom as voting starts
item.description: As voters in the key swing state of Pennsylvania start receiving mail ballots, multiple legal fights over how the ballots of mail-in voters should be counted are still playing out in the courts.
item.content:encoded:
As voters in the key swing state of Pennsylvania start receiving mail ballots, multiple legal fights over how the ballots of mail-in voters should be counted are still playing out in the courts.

(Image credit: Matt Slocum)
item.dc:creator: Hansi Lo Wang

item.title: Do you know your indicted mayors from your deported pandas? Take our news quiz
item.description: This week, a zoo said it would send its pandas packing, a fabled game character finally got her chance to shine, and a mayor was indicted. Were you paying attention?
item.content:encoded: This week, a zoo said it would send its pandas packing, a fabled game character finally got her chance to shine, and a mayor was indicted. Were you paying attention?
item.dc:creator: Holly J. Morris
